attributes.action: change the law on passports to prevent non-residential parents from applying for a childs passport without consent of the parent the child lives with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present having parental responsibility means both parents have equal rights.

This petition is aimed to prevent non-residential parents with PR from  simply applying for a passport without consent of the parent the child live with.

Although both parents should have the right to make choices about their childs upbringing, residential parents should have the final say in major issues affecting their children.
